main event: Witnesses observed a weather balloon released by the U.S. Weather Bureau in Sergeant Bluff, Iowa.
interesting points: The balloon was launched at 0600Z and observed for 30 minutes,The object was described as moving slowly, stopping and starting, and drifting to the north,The observation was made from the backyard of a house and also from the Sergeant Bluff airport,The object appeared to rise and circle to the left before disappearing,The original report concluded that the sighted object was a weather balloon.
witness description: Neighbors' children and individuals at the Sergeant Bluff airport.
